creator: rmaron@hotmail.com
text:
I've just installed apache 2.2.9 on my computer.
When ever I try to start it I get the following error message:
"Apache HTTP Server has encountered a problem and needs to close"
With an error signature:
AppName: httpd.exe	 AppVer: 2.2.9.0	 ModName: libhttpd.dll
ModVer: 2.2.9.0	 Offset: 0001b417

Note: PHP is not installed on my computer.
Please Let me know if I can supply an additional information that might be helpful.

Regards.
Please retry with the latest version (2.2.x or 2.4.x).
creator: trawick@apache.org
toscano.luca@gmail.com
text:
No traction for a long time, I am inclined to close this bug. Please re-open it if you need further assistance!

Luca
